attributes.action: create family houses by assisting Senior Citizens to move from their family homes to smaller accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Througout the Country there are many older people, single or with partners, still living in the family home. Many are put off from moving because of the trauma that a house move brings.

Could a package be made available to these people to help them to downsize and make available these family homes for familys.

I am currently going through the process and have found it very stressfull.

In particular I was involved with a potential purchaser who kept me hanging in limbo for several months before pulling out of the deal.

From my limited knowledge of it the Scottish System seems to have a lot to offer.

Best Wishes in your new role.

Derek Wiles
